import React, { useState, useRef } from 'react' import Modal from 'react-modal'; import Calendar from 'react-calendar'; import DatePicker from "react-datepicker"; import "react-datepicker/dist/react-datepicker.css"; import { ToastContainer, Toast, toast } from "react-toastify" const customStyles = { content: { top: '50%', left: '50%', right: 'auto', bottom: 'auto', marginRight: '-50%', transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)', }, }; Modal.setAppElement('#root'); const Invitation = (props) => { const [locations, setLocations] = useState('Residence'); const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState(new Date()); const nobox = useRef(); const [car, setCar] = useState(false); const closeModal = () => { props.setIsOpen(false); } const handleLocation = (e) => { if (props.status === 'student' && e.target.value !== 'Residence') { toast.error("Erorr", { theme: 'dark' }); } else { setLocations(e.target.value) } } return (
